bug.author: brollb
bug.summary: Exception in dev mode when changing projects "Cannot read property 'getValidAttributeNames' of null"
bug.description: TextEditor should check that the new id in selectedObjectChanged is valid before loading the node to check if it has the given attribute <denchmark-code>TextEditorControl.js:69 Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'getValidAttributeNames' of null </denchmark-code>
